title: Generic Output Schema for parse_args.jq
description: Describes the generic structure of the JSON object produced by the parse_args.jq script. The script generates an object where keys correspond to the argument names defined in the input spec, and the values are the final, type-coerced results.

additionalProperties.description: The value of a parsed argument after it has been processed and type-coerced. It can be any valid JSON type (string, number, boolean, object, array, or null) depending on the 'type' specified for it in the argument spec.

messages.content: What is the capital of France?
